tag_list: geospatial, business-intelligence, geobi, gis, quebec, spatial-analytics
overview:
Luc Vaillancourt is a founder and CEO of Spatialytics Solutions Inc. (Spatialytics), a GeoBI company involved in the Business Intelligence and Geospatial industries, founded in 2009.

Luc Vaillancourt founded BALIZ Inc. in 2007, a consulting firm helping organisations maximize their usage of geospatial technologies and insights obtained from geographic information. BALIZ is now dedicated on publishing BALIZ-MEDIA.com, a French-speaking online magazine and a news & blog aggregator covering the Geospatial industry.

Luc Vaillancourt founded KOREM Inc. in 1993 and led the growth of this company in the Geospatial industry until 2005.

Luc Vaillancourt obtained a bachelorâ€™s degree in Geography from UniversitÃ© Laval (QuÃ©bec, QC, Canada) in 1993 and specialized himself in geographic information processing and representation.
